metadata.title: Friday, 13th March, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when construction of the following basic schools in Kafulafuta Parliamentary Constituency will be completed

parts: (a)    when the Government will build an office block and housing units for the police in Rufunsa District; and
(b)    what the estimated cost of the two projects is.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs when the issuance of National Registration Cards under the mobile registration system will commence in Mitete District.
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate Sokontwe Primary School in Milenge District, which was built in 1967;
(b)    if so, when the works will commence;
(c)    what the time-frame for the completion of the project is; and
(d)    if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education whether Grade 10 classes will be introduced at the following schools in Mitete District in 2015
parts: (c)    Mitete. NOTICE OF MOTION Ms Namugala Report of the Parliamentary Select Committee:  That this House do adopt the Report of the Parliamentary Select Committee appointed to scrutinise the Presidential appointment of Dr Denny Hamachila Kalyalya to serve as Governor of the Bank of Zambia, for the Fourth Session of the Eleventh National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on 11th March, 2015.
